results.overview: Suzanne has been a prostitute for 15 years. She has her turf, her regular johns, her freedom. One day, young African prostitutes settle nearby. Suzanne is threatened.
results.title: Back Alley

results.overview: The inside story of six fighters – six of the fastest motorcycle racers of all time – and of the fates that awaited them at the peak of the sport. It's the story of what is at stake for all of them: all that can be won, and all that can be lost, when you go chasing glory at over two hundred miles an hour – on a motorcycle.  But this documentary is also an opportunity to understand the passionate relationship that links the pilots, the technical teams and the legions of fans to the spirit of GP Moto.
results.title: Hitting the Apex

results.overview: Georges Deblache, a despondent middle-aged cop, falls for his partner's wife.
results.title: Dirty Like an Angel

results.overview: An alcoholic falls in love with and gets married to a young woman, whom he systematically addicts to booze so they can share his "passion" together.
results.title: Days of Wine and Roses

results.overview: Down the road from Woodstock in the early 1970s, a revolution blossomed in a ramshackle summer camp for disabled teenagers, transforming their young lives and igniting a landmark movement.
results.title: Crip Camp: A Disability Revolution

results.original_title: The People We Hate at the Wedding
results.overview: A dysfunctional family that can't seem to get along and get it together reluctantly reunites for a family wedding. As their many skeletons are wrenched from the closet, it turns out to be just what this singular family needs to reconnect.
results.title: The People We Hate at the Wedding

results.original_title: Espaço Além - Marina Abramović e o Brasil
results.overview: Marina Abramović travels through Brazil, in search of personal healing and artistic inspiration, experiencing sacred rituals and revealing her creative process. The route is comprised of poignant encounters with healers and sages from the Brazilian countryside, exploring the limits between art and spirituality. This external trip triggers in Marina a profound introspective journey through memories, pain and past experiences.
results.title: The Space in Between: Marina Abramović and Brazil

results.overview: Three Scottish officers, including Sir Archi, murder Sir Arne and his household for a coffin filled with gold. The only survivor is Elsalill, who moves to relatives in Marstrand. There she meets a charming young officer- Sir Archi- and she soon understands that he was one of the murderers.
results.title: Sir Arne's Treasure

results.overview: The film tells the life of Maria Fe, a young woman who faces singleness after six years of relationship. Along with her two soul friends, played by Karina Jordán and Jely Reátegui, the girl must learn to be single again. On the way, you will run into old loves, new adventures and lots of fun.
results.title: How to Get Over a Breakup

results.overview: In 1988, a teenage girl's life is thrown into chaos when her mother disappears.
results.title: White Bird in a Blizzard

results.overview: Get ready for a battle of the ages when the Justice League faces off against its archenemies, the Legion of Doom, in an all-new movie from DC Comics. A mysterious being known as the Time Trapper arises, and a sinister plan led by Lex Luthor sends the Legion of Doom back in time to eliminate Superman, Wonder Woman and Batman before they become super heroes. For Aquaman, Flash and Cyborg, along with teen super heroes Karate Kid and Dawnstar, the stakes have never been higher, the rescue mission never deadlier. So join the fight for the future as the Justice League confronts its ultimate challenge… the threat of having never existed!
results.title: JLA Adventures: Trapped in Time

results.original_title: Forky Asks a Question: What Is Cheese?
results.overview: Buttercup, annoyed with all of Forky's questions, speed teaches everything there is.
results.title: Forky Asks a Question: What Is Cheese?

results.overview: It's 1957, and James Whale's heyday as the director of "Frankenstein," "Bride of Frankenstein" and "The Invisible Man" is long behind him. Retired and a semi-recluse, he lives his days accompanied only by images from his past. When his dour housekeeper, Hannah, hires a handsome young gardener, the flamboyant director and simple yard man develop an unlikely friendship, which will change them forever.
results.title: Gods and Monsters

results.overview: Giant robots appear out of the mist and attack the city of Montevideo, Uruguay.
results.title: Panic Attack!

results.original_title: La nuit a dévoré le monde
results.overview: After waking up to find himself all alone in an apartment where a massive party was being held the night before, Sam is immediately forced to face a terrifying reality: the living dead have invaded the streets of Paris.
results.title: The Night Eats the World

results.overview: A tale of revenge, honor and disgrace, centering on a poverty-stricken samurai who discovers the fate of his ronin son-in-law, setting in motion a tense showdown of vengeance against the house of a feudal lord.
results.title: Hara-Kiri: Death of a Samurai

results.overview: A ship carrying settlers to a new home on Mars after Earth is rendered uninhabitable is knocked off-course, causing the passengers to consider their place in the universe.
results.title: Aniara

results.overview: After her husband dies, Alice and her son, Tommy, leave their small New Mexico town for California, where Alice hopes to make a new life for herself as a singer. Money problems force them to settle in Arizona instead, where Alice takes a job as waitress in a small diner.
results.title: Alice Doesn't Live Here Anymore

results.overview: Ten people are invited to a hotel in the Iranian desert, only to find that an unseen person is killing them one by one. Could one of them be the killer?
results.title: And Then There Were None

results.overview: A British naval officer fights pirates in Madagascar.
results.title: Against All Flags
